text_block_list.text: Something you want me to see……? This is——
Something you want me to see……? This is——

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Since this spring……around the time of the 
『Hanshin Uma Musume S』, we've been writing. Almost everyday.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Up until then……both of us were starting to feel lonely. 
We thought our dream to move forward in to the future 
would start fading so we ended up not keeping in touch.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
That's why, when Kraft was really struggling, 
there wasn't really much I could do for her though——

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
After the 『Hanshin Uma Musume S』, 
Kraft was the one to suggest it.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
——I'll be fine now. No matter what happens, no matter how 
many times, I'm ready to stand up again……is what she said.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……Just look at this, Trainer. It's mostly just 
casual conversations between Kraft and me……But

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Please.

I looked at the tablet she handed me. The first 
thing that caught my eye was a picture of cherry 
blossoms that Rhein Kraft had probably taken——

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: 『Do you remember the day we joined the team?』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『Right after the Selection Race, both of us went to ask, right!? 
It seems like we surprised Trainer-san, but they still said OK』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『I was super excited but Cesario, you never switched off! 
I was the only one being embarrassing there～』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『But, I was glad. We became members of the team 
we admired! That was the start of our dream!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『Listen listen listen listen! Today, Sweep-san 
asked me to help her prepare one of her spells～！』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『Air Groove-san and Hishi Amazon-san both came mid-way too 
……Our Tiara senpais are really wonderful, aren't they～!?』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『You can't help……admiring them. I want to be like 
that too. A line that connects to the Tiara Uma Musume!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『That feeling really gives me the most strength. 
That's what I was thinking so deeply about today!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『——And you see, together with Heart-san, we ended up 
talking about how fun last year's summer camp was!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『We all had a lot of fun, huh? At Heart-san's 
suggestion, it ended up becoming a dance contest!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『And King-san jumping in with her swimsuit! 
She was so pretty～. Once I get a little older, 
I wonder if something like that will look good on me?』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『And at nighttime during the barbeque, we talked so much……At that 
time, I didn't think I'd be so far apart from Cesario though』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『But, I'm fine! We'll be fine, won't we? With the same 
dream, towards a wonderful future, we're moving forward!』

Several memories of Rhein Kraft came to mind. My chest 
tightened, emotions overflowing as my vision wavered.

Honestly, it was——really hard to watch this. But, I continued 
reading to find out what Cesario was entrusting to me.
……And then——

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『Big neeeeeews～～! 
Team <Ascella> has a new member!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: 『Her name's Fusaichi Pandora-san——』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……Have you noticed? Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
That's right. ……Ever since then, 
it's gradually changed. The contents.

I look up from the tablet, my eyes meeting Cesario's. ……Even in 
front of her ailing friend who remains asleep, she shed no tears.
choice_data_list: You came to show me this 『Feeling』
You came to show me this 『Feeling』

text_block_list.text:
This isn't just to reminisce. This exchange with Kraft is 
filled with so many emotions……that you wanted to show us.

This isn't just to reminisce. This exchange with Kraft is 
filled with so many emotions……that you wanted to show us.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……Yes.

Thank you, Cesario. ……But, that's right. 
Then this isn't just for me——
choice_data_list: Another person needs to hear this
Another person needs to hear this

text_block_list.text:
Thank you, Cesario. ……But, that's right. 
Then this isn't just for me——
choice_data_list: Another person needs to hear this
Another person needs to hear this

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: This……you want me to? ……Is it okay to look at this?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah. Got it……——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Ah……this is from when I transferred teams…… 
……Haha, no way. Ku-chan-senpai was really surprised——)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『And while it really was a surprise……still! 
I was happy! Reaaaaally～～!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『Even if it was just a little, she admired me. And talked about a 
dream like "Let's become legends together!"……a girl like that——』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『Just because she wanted to run with me, she came to our team! How 
should I put it……I don't know why, but it made me super super happy!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『That's why I'm looking forward to it. To what will 
happen while being on the same team as Pandora-san. 
……Yeah, I'm really looking forward to it!』

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (Wait……wait, huh? Isn't it——)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (Isn't it……all just about me?)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『Thanks for the advice, Cesario……! Thanks to you, 
it looks like I can keep working hard as an instructor!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『I tried out a whole bunch of things you told me! 
And you see, today we did so much more training than usual』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『And Pandora-san looked like she was having a 
lot more fun. It made me feel all warm～ inside♪』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『So, I wondered what it would be like if I asked you so I 
could try it myself. Your guidance please, Cesario-sensei!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『——Please. 
I want to do all that I can. For Pandora-san』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『——And that's why, I really want to win the Victoria Mile. Heart-san 
and Messiah-san are as intimidating as ever, but even then!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『I want to win. I want to show her my win! 
And then, I want to become Pandora-san's strength』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『If Pandora-san stumbles or loses heart, 
when she needs a light for the path forward——』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『I want to……be a light like that. 
I want to be that light for her』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『Was I able to convey that? I can't really put it in to words, 
so I don't know. Even then……I'd like to think it reached Pandora-san』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『That even if you lose and feel frustrated, it'll 
still be okay. Let's stand up again, let's run again』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『It's fine, you'll be fine for sure! 
Because Pandora-san's future will surely be——』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『Something nobody has ever seen before, it'll shine bright 
and be wonderful. If it's Pandora-san, then you can do it!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: 『That's just how brightly you always shine in my eyes』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『You're so brilliant. 
An Uma Musume that's a collection of hopes——』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『I wonder if I was able to properly convey it all. 
My feelings, all of them——』

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (——『Feelings』)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (Ku-chan-senpai's feelings——)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ——……Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Next month's 『Queen Elizabeth Cup』, I want to enter it.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
For a Tiara Uma Musume, it's a race that can't be 
missed, right? I want to enter. ……Enter and win.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
That's why……Please. 
What I'm about to say next, will you hear me out?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: I get it. ……Trainer, you see, I——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Wasn't a genius.
